channel.title: Cancelservers on SoftLayer API

item.title: create_cancel_server_ticket.py
item.description: """ Create cancel server ticket Important manual pages: http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Ticket/ http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Ticket/createCancelServerTicket License: http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License Author: SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> """ import SoftLayer # Your SoftLayer API username. USERNAME = 'set me' # Generate one at https://manage.softlayer.com/Administrative/apiKeychain. API_KEY = 'set me' # Declare the API client and creating the services that we need client = SoftLayer.Client(username=USERNAME, api_key=API_KEY) ticketService = client['SoftLayer_Ticket'] serverId = 198982 reason = "No longer needed" content = "cancel because we want a new server" try: result = ticketService.
